GSD.description:
ext4: filter out EXT4_FC_REPLAY from on-disk superblock field s_state

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.121 by commit cc5b09cb6dacd4b32640537929ab4ee8fb2b9e04. For more details please see the references link.
